steps.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.
Measure out 6 tbs of butter and put in a microwave-safe bowl.
Melt it until its really melty.
Pour it in the pan.
Mix together the Bisquick, sugar, and milk.
Pour the mix you just mixed over the melted butter and mix.
Sprinkle the blueberries evenly over the mix in the pan.
Bake in the oven
Carefully measure flour, baking powder, milk and yoghurt.
Sift flour and baking powder in to medium bowl.
Whisk milk, yoghurt and egg together in a jug.
Make a well in the centre of the dry ingredients, add liquids.
Using a wooden spoon, mix well.
Grate carrot.
Finely chop broccoli, cauliflower and green beans.
Place in a microwavable bowl with a quarter cup of water
Microwave on high for 2 minutes to soften vegetables.
Grate cheese.
Add vegetables to pancake batter.
Mix in grated cheese.
Heat oil in frying pan on medium.
Divide pancake mixture into 3 - 4 serves.
Pour pancake mixture into the pans
cook until golden brown on both sides.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.

Peel the skin form the radishes and rinse it.
Slice it to thin circular slices.
Chop napa cabbage into thin slices.
Peel the skin off of the onions and slice into cubes.
Thinly slice the green onions.
In a large non-stick pan, sauce the onion, until slightly golden brown.
Once the onion is cooked, placed the sliced napa cabbage onto the pan.
Stir fry it for about 2 minutes.
Add the radish into the pan and stir fry it until soft.
To season and garnish, add a couple of teaspoons soy sauce, half a teaspoon of sesame oil, a pinch of salt and pepper.
Place the bacon slices onto a pan.
Cook until crispy.
Slice it to a smaller size to make bacon bits
Top the radish dish with some bacon bits!

wash and clean okra with the help of cloth.
Cut the okra small .
Cut the onion and tamatos very small.
Cut the chilly and cabages cut it like longly.
Fry the okra for exactly 15 min.
Mix the onion with okra
Fry it.
Put all the cabage tomatos and chilly.
Put all the masalas like chilly podwer we made.
Add the salt to the fryed okra.
Finaly mix every thing so our ladyiesfinger  fry is ready.

cook about 3 cups of rice with your rice cooker.
Add enough oil to cover the bottom of the pan.
Heat the pan on medium for 5 min.
Dice the chicken, onion and carrots
throw all the diced foods into the HOT pan.
keep sauting until chicken is done.
Keep stirring with spoon or spatula.
Mince your garlic
Put your garlic on top AFTER chicken is fully cooked.
Now add your sauce
Add chicken to your cooked rice

Take a clean kitchen knife and cut the required portion of the banana stem.
wash it in water to remove the gluey liquid.
Cut onion, cabbage, and chilly into small slices...
Heat a big pan with required oil.
Put some mustard seeds for traditional Indian Flavor after preheating.
Mix the onion,cabbage,banana stem,and chilly in the frying pan.
Fry everything you mixed until onion turns Golden Brown in color.
Put salt, turmeric powder, coriander powder, ginger garlic paste and chilly powder.
Fry everything in the pan.

Preheat your oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit.
Grease a 9x13 inch pan.
Melt your 1 cup of butter in the microwave until it is completely melted.
crush 2 cups (approximately 2 sleeves) of graham crackers.
Mix the melted butter and crushed graham crackers together.
Take about 3/4 (doesn't need to be exact) of your butter/graham cracker mixture and press into the bottom of your greased pan.
Unwrap your candy bars and arrange them.
Evenly spread out your bag of mini marshmallows across entire pan.
Sprinkle your remaining butter/graham cracker mixture across pan.
Place pan in oven for 15 mintues.
Cut and Enjoy!

cook until golden brown on both sides.
Pre-heat oven to 425 degrees.
In a medium size saucepan, melt butter and brown sugar together. Stirring constantly.
Place the crackers on a cookie sheet and pour the sugar/butter mixture over them.
Bake for 4 minutes.
Sprinkle chocolate chips (or chocolate chunks) over hot Butter/sugar. They will begin to melt immediately.
Smooth with spoon.
Place in refridgerator for 30 minutes.
Break apart and put candy on plate.
At last, put sliced almonds on the top.

Preheat the oven at 250 C
Melt 1 cup of sugar in the pan, at high fire
In a bowl stir 6 eggs till they are bubbly.
Heat the milk, but do not boil it, if you boil it the eggs wil cook and damage the flan.
Mix the eggs with the milk and stir it constantly, until it has a uniform color
When the caramel is ready, put it in the mold in 5 minutes and spread it.
Mix the milk with -1tbsp essence of Vanilla -1 tbsp cinnamon -1/2 cup sugar
Pour the flan over the caramel
Put it in the oven by 40 minutes till it is golden

Mince the ground beef in a large bowl with a spatula.
Dice the onions then add that to the bowl of ground beef.
Add a few drops of Worcester Sauce to the ground beef.
Add a few shakes to make sure its all covered.
Stir everything slowly and constantly to ensure a nice and even coat of everything on it.
Grab the ground beef in your hands and form it into little balls then place on the griddle.
Heat them until the meatballs are brown.
Put the meatballs in a bowl
Add Bull's Eyes Barbecue sauce

Make a hole in the top of the egg and empty the contents, into a bowl.
wash the egg furtherly under the tap.
carefully pull the edges of the egg shell off so that the top is open quite wide.
add some food colouring into a bowl and role the egg shell around until it's covered
Let it stand up in the bowl to dry.
Heat chocolate in the microwave for 1 min. It will get cold in 2 mins after you take it out.
Get some kitchen roll and wipe the egg shell it should leave a yellow tinted colour on the shell.
spoon the melted chocolate into the egg shell.
place the toy in the chocolate egg, you are now done.
Let them harden in the fridge.

Pour water into the cup to where you prefer
Add the cling film firmly around the rim
Then stick the glass into the freezer upside down
Wait 1 hour for it to freeze
Boil some water in a thermostatic kettle
Then run some hot water into the ice to burn a hole
Add your cocktail and enjoy ( it's better with a straw)
put the chocolate in a bowl.
microwave until it's melted
put the chocolate into a large bowl.
crush the crisps into a mush then add them to the chocolate
(This is very messy )mix the crisps with your hands to make a thick stodgy mixture
mix the icing sugar with some water and the yellow food colouring
Dip the dinosaur toy in the yellow mixture (this makes the toy sticky so that the chocolate sticks to it.)
Add a tea spoon of the icing sugar mixture to the chocolate to make it sticky then mould it around the toy to create an egg shape
Crumble the digestive biscuit up onto a plate.
Place the chocolate mass onto it and roll it around so that it's covered to make more covered.
Put some of the yellow icing on your fingers then rub it onto the egg then role it around again.
put it in the fridge to harden
First, add a tablespoon of butter into a bowl
Microwave it until it melts.
Then, spread the melted butter on one side of each of the bread slices.
Slice up the mozzarella and spread it out on one of the bread slices in the pan, un-buttered side up.
Then, even distribute about 4 slices of pepperoni over the mozzarella.
From there, bring the pan over to medium heat
Toast the sandwich.
Toast on the other side.
Put the sandwich into a plate.
Now, just slice it in half, and it's ready to serve!

Break all the chocolate into pieces and cut the butter.
Next melt the chocolate and the butter together with the bain-marie technique.
Preheat your oven to 200 degrees celsius ( 390 degrees fahrenheit).
Crack the eggs and tilt the yolk back and forth between the two halves of the eggshells and allow the whites to drip into a bowl below.
Add the sugar to the egg yolks
Keep beating constantly for 30s.
Next add the flour.
Keep beating until it is smooth.
Add the melted chocolate and butter to the mixture before the chocolate gets cold in 5 minutes..
Keep beating until it is well mixed.
Add the egg whites to the mixture
Incorporate well.
Put the mixture in a buttered quiche mold.
Bake for about  35 minutes
Remove the leaves from the cauliflower
Chop the onions roughly
Roughly chop the cauliflower
Roughly chop basil and oregano
Measure cheeses
Put cauliflower, garlic and onion in food processor and process until its very fine
Put your cauliflower and onion into a microwave safe bowl and cover it.
Microwave for 5 minutes until it is tender and the center is hot.
Let it cool on a towel.
Wrap the towel around the cooled cauliflower and squeeze it until you can't squeeze it anymore.
Preheat oven to 450 degrees
Add your herbs, pepper flakes, salt, cheeses, eggs and cauliflower to a bowl.
Mix it together with hands. When it's combined, gey ready to roll
Place a large piece of parchment paper down and rub some olive oil on the paper and proceed to roll it out
Put your rolled crust in the oven for 8 minutes, until it is crispy and brown
Place a layer of sauce and cheese then the toppings
Bake for another 5 mins.
Let it cool for a few minutes
First, start with blending the chilies, ginger and coriander along with some cumin seeds.
Partially blend the chana dal with the mixture from the previous step.
Slice the onions
Once the mixture is ready, you need to mix the mixture with cut onion.
Later add some coriander and curry leaves and continue mixing.
Heat up some oil in a pan.
Shape the paste into circular disk-shaped chunks.
Deep fry the shaped chunks in the hot oil.
Fry the vada in oil until it turns golden brown.
Serve the dish hot and along whit some ketchup and some mint chutney.

Measure out 460ml of milk.
Mix the milk along with 50g sugar and 50g butter in a thick bottomed pot.
Boil the milk mixture.
Keep it aside to cool.
Cut off the edges in the bread slices, and cut them in halves.
Arrange the bread slices on to a tray.
Add layers of bread depending on the tray you are using.
And keep aside.
Crack eggs and separate egg York and egg whites.
Add the egg yorks to the cooled milk mixture.
And add two teaspoons of vanilla extract.
Preheat the oven, 10 minute in moderate temperature (180 ⁰C, 350 ⁰F, 4-5 gas mark)
Pour the milk mixture over the arranged bread.
And bake in moderate oven for 15 minutes.
Soften the jam by warming it up in the microwave.
Take a bowl which is grease free and dry.
Beat egg whites along with sugar and cream of tartar until it forms stiff peaks.
Add few drops of rose essence or almond essence to the meringue topping.
Once the bread is baked, spread jam over the bread.
Using a large star tipped piping bag, pipe the meringue topping over the jam using shell technique.
Preheat oven for 10 minutes in 240 ⁰C using only top heat.
Bake the pudding till its golden brown.
Pour water into the cup to where you prefer
Add the cling film firmly around the rim
Then stick the glass into the freezer upside down
Wait 1 hour for it to freeze
Boil some water in a thermostatic kettle
Then run some hot water into the ice to burn a hole
Add your cocktail and enjoy ( it's better with a straw)
Place the fish in a cooking pot with enough water to cover them.
Let it boil for around 20 minutes or until they look perfectly cooked.
Drain them and put them in a bowl.
Use a fork to smash them.
Chop the onion and tomato in little squares.
Put the onion in a pan with a little oil.
Let it cook a little for 5 minutes.
Place the tomato and stir.
Let it cook for 5 minutes stirring constantly.
When it's ready put the fish in the pan and mix well.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Let it cool down.
Warm the tortillas for 1 minute in the microwave.
Put the fish we made in the middle of the tortilla using a spoon and make sure it doesn't reach the edge.
Fold the tortilla in half and put one toothpick on each side to hold it closed.
Fry them in a pan with oil
Take the toothpicks off and serve when they are still warm.

Preheat your oven at 350 Degrees
Pour out all the mix from the box into your big bowl.
Mix with 1/3 cup of oil,  3 Eggs and 1 cup of water
Mix the ingredients until the cake mix is smooth and all of the lumps is gone
Butter your pan.
Pour all of the mix into the buttered pan
Heat the pan in the oven for 15 minutes
Let it sit out for about 5 minutes so it can cool down
Ice the cake in the fridge.
To begin, spray glass or metal pan with cooking spray.
Put pretzels in a plastic bag and roll, smash, or break pretzels into smaller pieces.
Set aside.
In a pot, melt butter and marshmallows on medium heat until mixed.
Then add peanut butter and continue mixing until melted.
Turn off stove and immediately remove pot from heat.
Quickly add rice crispy cereal and pretzels.
Stir until well covered in peanut butter marshmallow mixture.
Take greased 13x9 pan and pour in rice crispy mixture.
Pat down evenly for uniform thickness.
Finally, microwave chocolate chips for 30 seconds.
Stir chocolate chips
Microwave for another 30 seconds.
Then use spoon to drizzle over the rice crispy treats.
Allow to cool for 5 minutes.
cut into squares and enjoy!

Preheat the oven at 250 C
Melt 1 cup of sugar in the pan, at high fire
In a bowl stir 6 eggs till they are bubbly.
Heat the milk, but do not boil it, if you boil it the eggs wil cook and damage the flan.
Mix the eggs with the milk and stir it constantly, until it has a uniform color
When the caramel is ready, put it in the mold in 5 minutes and spread it.
Mix the milk with -1tbsp essence of Vanilla -1 tbsp cinnamon -1/2 cup sugar
Pour the flan over the caramel
Put it in the oven by 40 minutes till it is golden
To begin, spray glass or metal pan with cooking spray.
Put pretzels in a plastic bag and roll, smash, or break pretzels into smaller pieces.
Set aside.
In a pot, melt butter and marshmallows on medium heat until mixed.
Then add peanut butter and continue mixing until melted.
Turn off stove and immediately remove pot from heat.
Quickly add rice crispy cereal and pretzels.
Stir until well covered in peanut butter marshmallow mixture.
Take greased 13x9 pan and pour in rice crispy mixture.
Pat down evenly for uniform thickness.
Finally, microwave chocolate chips for 30 seconds.
Stir chocolate chips
Microwave for another 30 seconds.
Then use spoon to drizzle over the rice crispy treats.
Allow to cool for 5 minutes.
cut into squares and enjoy!
cook about 3 cups of rice with your rice cooker.
Add enough oil to cover the bottom of the pan.
Heat the pan on medium for 5 min.
Dice the chicken, onion and carrots
throw all the diced foods into the HOT pan.
keep sauting until chicken is done.
Keep stirring with spoon or spatula.
Mince your garlic
Put your garlic on top AFTER chicken is fully cooked.
Now add your sauce
Add chicken to your cooked rice

Preheat your oven at 350 Degrees
Pour out all the mix from the box into your big bowl.
Mix with 1/3 cup of oil,  3 Eggs and 1 cup of water
Mix the ingredients until the cake mix is smooth and all of the lumps is gone
Butter your pan.

Preheat your oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit.
Grease a 9x13 inch pan.
Melt your 1 cup of butter in the microwave until it is completely melted.
crush 2 cups (approximately 2 sleeves) of graham crackers.
Mix the melted butter and crushed graham crackers together.
Take about 3/4 (doesn't need to be exact) of your butter/graham cracker mixture and press into the bottom of your greased pan.
Unwrap your candy bars and arrange them.
Evenly spread out your bag of mini marshmallows across entire pan.
Sprinkle your remaining butter/graham cracker mixture across pan.
Place pan in oven for 15 mintues.
Cut and Enjoy!
Peel the skin form the radishes and rinse it.
Slice it to thin circular slices.
Chop napa cabbage into thin slices.
Peel the skin off of the onions and slice into cubes.
Thinly slice the green onions.
In a large non-stick pan, sauce the onion, until slightly golden brown.
Once the onion is cooked, placed the sliced napa cabbage onto the pan.
Stir fry it for about 2 minutes.
Add the radish into the pan and stir fry it until soft.
To season and garnish, add a couple of teaspoons soy sauce, half a teaspoon of sesame oil, a pinch of salt and pepper.
Place the bacon slices onto a pan.
Cook until crispy.
Slice it to a smaller size to make bacon bits
Top the radish dish with some bacon bits!

Preheat your oven to 350 F.
In a small bowl, mix the hazelnuts and sugar.
In a large bowl, whisk the flour, confectioner's sugar and corn starch.
Cut in the butter until crumbly.
Add the butter and mix them in the bowl.
Transfer your mixture to a clean work surface.
Knead gently until the mixture forms a soft dough.
Divide your dough in half.
On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to about 1/8 inch thickness.
Cut with a floured cookie cutter, between 2 and 3 inches.
Transfer cookies to a greased baking sheet.
Fill your cookies with 1/4 teaspoon of Nutella!
Fold your cookies partway over, just enough to cover the filling.
Brush the tops of the cookies with the beaten egg, then sprinkle with hazelnut mixture.
Bake cookies 10 minutes or until the bottoms are light brown.
Transfer to a wire rack to cool.

Preheat your oven to 200 degrees celsius ( 390 degrees fahrenheit).
Crack the eggs and tilt the yolk back and forth between the two halves of the eggshells and allow the whites to drip into a bowl below.
Add the sugar to the egg yolks
Keep beating constantly for 30s.

Keep beating until it is smooth.
Add the melted chocolate and butter to the mixture before the chocolate gets cold in 5 minutes..
Keep beating until it is well mixed.
Add the egg whites to the mixture
Incorporate well.
Put the mixture in a buttered quiche mold.
Bake for about  35 minutes

Wash your vegetables (tomatoes,celery,pepper,onion) before cutting!
Cut up all the vegetables into bite sized pieces or any size that you prefer.
Put cans of beans in a strainer, use water to strain. Strain until all the juices are gone and just the beans are left.
Preheat the stove.
Heat the meat until it is all brown( make sure the stove is on medium-high).
Add the beans from the strainer into the meat and stir it around (Heat still on medium-high)
Add in all the cut up vegetables.
Stir everything around for a couple of minutes with the heat on Medium-high
Since the food was nearly all the way up to the brim, we move the contents to a bigger bowl
Put your pot on top of a heat tamer/diffuser. Make sure the heat is still on medium-high
Add the tomato sauce and paste into the chilli.
Stir everything for about 2 minutes
Let it simmer down for about 15 minutes
Add about a teaspoon of Cayenne pepper to the meal
Let it simmer for about 5 minutes and then serve
Pour water into the cup to where you prefer
Add the cling film firmly around the rim
Then stick the glass into the freezer upside down
Wait 1 hour for it to freeze
Boil some water in a thermostatic kettle
Then run some hot water into the ice to burn a hole
Add your cocktail and enjoy ( it's better with a straw)
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.
Separate the cake mix into six different containers.
Slowly add food coloring, bit by bit, until you achieve the desired color
Place cupcake liners on the cupcake pan.
Slowly add food coloring, bit by bit, until you achieve the desired color
Bake the cake in an oven
Remove the cupcake pan from the oven
Allow cupcakes to cool down completely.
Mix 1 cup of whipping cream, 1/4 cup of confectioner's sugar, and approximately one teaspoon of vanilla extract (flavor the frosting to your desired taste).
Add blue food coloring to resemble a sky blue color.
Using an electric mixer, mix at a medium high speed.
Using a rubber spatula, place the the prepared frosting inside a ziploc bag.
Seal the bag.
Cut a corner off with scissors.
Start by piping frosting around the outside edge of the top of the cupcake and move the Ziploc bag in a spiral motion inward until ending in the very middle of the cupcake.
Using a knife, cut the sour strip candy in half and place a piece on the already frosted cupcake.
Cut the small marshmallows in half and place them at each end of the rainbow.
cook about 3 cups of rice with your rice cooker.
Add enough oil to cover the bottom of the pan.
Heat the pan on medium for 5 min.
Dice the chicken, onion and carrots
throw all the diced foods into the HOT pan.
keep sauting until chicken is done.
Keep stirring with spoon or spatula.
Mince your garlic
Put your garlic on top AFTER chicken is fully cooked.
Now add your sauce
Add chicken to your cooked rice
Preheat the oven at 250 C
Melt 1 cup of sugar in the pan, at high fire
In a bowl stir 6 eggs till they are bubbly.
Heat the milk, but do not boil it, if you boil it the eggs wil cook and damage the flan.
Mix the eggs with the milk and stir it constantly, until it has a uniform color
When the caramel is ready, put it in the mold in 5 minutes and spread it.
Mix the milk with -1tbsp essence of Vanilla -1 tbsp cinnamon -1/2 cup sugar
Pour the flan over the caramel
Put it in the oven by 40 minutes till it is golden
Mince the ground beef in a large bowl with a spatula.
Dice the onions then add that to the bowl of ground beef.
Add a few drops of Worcester Sauce to the ground beef.
Add a few shakes to make sure its all covered.
Stir everything slowly and constantly to ensure a nice and even coat of everything on it.
Grab the ground beef in your hands and form it into little balls then place on the griddle.
Heat them until the meatballs are brown.
Put the meatballs in a bowl
Add Bull's Eyes Barbecue sauce

wash it in water to remove the gluey liquid.

Fry everything in the pan.

Make a hole in the top of the egg and empty the contents, into a bowl.
wash the egg furtherly under the tap.
carefully pull the edges of the egg shell off so that the top is open quite wide.
add some food colouring into a bowl and role the egg shell around until it's covered
Let it stand up in the bowl to dry.
Heat chocolate in the microwave for 1 min. It will get cold in 2 mins after you take it out.
Get some kitchen roll and wipe the egg shell it should leave a yellow tinted colour on the shell.
spoon the melted chocolate into the egg shell.
place the toy in the chocolate egg, you are now done.
Let them harden in the fridge.

Break all the chocolate into pieces and cut the butter.
Next melt the chocolate and the butter together with the bain-marie technique.
Preheat your oven to 200 degrees celsius ( 390 degrees fahrenheit).
Crack the eggs and tilt the yolk back and forth between the two halves of the eggshells and allow the whites to drip into a bowl below.
Add the sugar to the egg yolks
Keep beating constantly for 30s.
Next add the flour.
Keep beating until it is smooth.
Add the melted chocolate and butter to the mixture before the chocolate gets cold in 5 minutes..
Keep beating until it is well mixed.
Add the egg whites to the mixture
Incorporate well.
Put the mixture in a buttered quiche mold.
Bake for about  35 minutes
